attributes.action:
Abolish the unelected House of Lords.
Create an elected body or dispose of it.
attributes.background: For years, members have been appointed by their peers without regard to their fitness to make decisions in the National interest. As we leave the European Union and take back democratic control of our Nation's future, this anachronism has to go.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/170686 (replace unelected House of Lords with a publicly elected body)

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183134 (abolish the House of Lords)
